text: Carlo Strenger (; July 16, 1958 – October 25, 2019) was a Swiss-Israeli psychologist, philosopher, existential psychoanalyst and public intellectual. He was professor of psychology and philosophy at Tel Aviv University. He was a senior research fellow at the Center for the Study of Terrorism at John Jay College. He was a columnist for Haaretz and for Neue Zürcher Zeitung. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Israeli psychologists Category:Swiss psychologists Category:Israeli philosophers Category:Scientists from Basel Category:Academics of Tel Aviv University
title: Carlo Strenger
